sentence: The image is a screenshot from a mobile app showing jokes about marriage.
sentence_cn: 该图片是来自某手机应用程序的截图，其中展示了一些有关婚姻的笑话。

sentence: - The top panel features a humorous statement: "I made the mistake of asking my wife what women want... she has been talking non-stop for the last 3 days!"
sentence_cn: - 顶部面板上有一句幽默的语句：“我犯了一个错误，问我的妻子女人想要什么...... 过去三天她一直在不停地说话！”
words: I made the mistake of asking my wife what women want... she has been talking non-stop for the last 3 days!

sentence: It depicts a cartoonish illustration of a man and a woman; the woman is shown speaking animatedly while the man has a slightly overwhelmed posture.
sentence_cn: 该作品描绘的是一名男子和一名女子的卡通画；画中女子正在生动地讲话，而男子则显得有些不知所措。

sentence: - The bottom panel starts with the phrase "A Man's Wife Has More Power Over Him Than" but is cut off, implying more text follows.
sentence_cn: - 底部面板以短语“男人的妻子比他更有权力”开头，但被切断，暗示后面还有更多文字。
words: A Man's Wife Has More Power Over Him Than

sentence: It includes a stylized graphic of a woman with a thoughtful expression.
sentence_cn: 其中包括一位表情若有所思的女性风格图形。

sentence: The image also shows app interface elements like sharing and favorite buttons, and an Amazon Shopping ad partially covering the bottom of the screenshot.
sentence_cn: 该图还展示了应用程序界面元素，如共享和收藏按钮，以及部分覆盖屏幕截图底部的亚马逊购物广告。
